thread.title: Scott Statement on Passage of Short-term Continuing Resolution (Robert C Scott)
thread.title_full: Scott Statement on Passage of Short-term Continuing Resolution (Robert C Scott) - Worldnews.com

author: wn.com
title: Scott Statement on Passage of Short-term Continuing Resolution (Robert C Scott)
text: ( Source : Robert C Scott ) WASHINGTON, D.C. - Congressman Robert C. ' Bobby' Scott ( VA-03 ) issued the following statement on passage of H.R. 719, the Continuing Appropriations Act for Fiscal Year 2016, which will fund the federal government
